meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unable to be distinguished or differentiated from something else.
meanings.sent1: The indistinguishableness of the twins made it hard for their friends to tell them apart.
meanings.sent2: The indistinguishableness of the two brands of soda confused the taste testers.
meanings.sent3: The indistinguishableness of the two cats led to a mix-up at the pet store.
meanings.sent4: The indistinguishableness of the colors in the painting created a mesmerizing effect.
meanings.sent5: The indistinguishableness of the voices on the phone made it challenging to identify the caller.
